column5: Hello all I am looking for 2 downriggers peferably electric but not a must. Tried to post in classifieds but it wouldn't let me.
Seems to be an issue these days.Mods ,get with it will ya.Best site going and a guy cant even post in the classifieds  Oh, Im looking for some aswell.

A friend of mine has two Cannon's hand for sale $250 for the pair they have the breakaway (QuickDraw Cabela's)rod holder on each one and both have quick release bases (not swivel) with a lot of wire I don't know how much wire or pound it is but there is enough to call them full of wire.
Perhaps a quick perusal of the classified rules would explain things.....just sayin.  http://www.ofncommun...ction=rules&f=5

Hey Fireman  I have two Big Jon electrics I am looking to sell. They both have swivel bases and I have cannonballs and some flashers etc that I can let go with them. I am looking for $400.00 for the works. Call me if you like. 905 239 8119 Stan
Stan are they long arms or capt. paks. I'd even be interested

Hey fishfarmer  I think they would be the Capt Paks, they are only about 20" or so long. I can send some pics a little later if you like. I am just heading out to Pigeon to try for some Wallies. I will check back here when I get back hopefully with some pics and dinner.  Stan
You can check out www.spoonpullers.com, the ForSale page has riggers on it regularly.
Thanks guys I'll be in touch. Still researching which make I want to invest in.  I hear the Cannons are #1 with Scotty coming in 2nd? Lots of crap to read through.  But again thanks
